TopicTitle: Game will stop loading at a certain point

Articles.Content:
A Reddit user helped me out, "Go into your mod directories and remove one part from any mod (doesn't have to be the one it's getting stuck on). Then start KSP again and it will load properly. You can then close KSP and replace the part you cut out, and it will still launch properly. I don't know what causes the problem, but this had fixed it every time."

KSP: 1.0.4 Windows 64bit OS (32bit Game)

Problem: During Loading into the game, the game will stop loading at http://i.imgur.com/b1ufaj1.png <this point, but will not freeze.

Mods installed:

  • Kerbal Konstructs
  • KerbinSide
  • DMagic Orbital Science
  • Distant Object Enhancement bis
  • Docking Port Alignment Indicator
  • Haystack Continued
  • Karbonite
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock
  • Kerbal Attachment System (KAS)
  • Kerbal Construction Time
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux
  • Kerbal Joint Reinforcement
  • Kerbal Inventory System (KIS)
  • MSI Infernal Robotics
  • OPT Space Plane Parts
  • Quantum Struts
  • Raster Prop Monitor
  • Rovers and Roadsters
  • SCANsat
  • Science Alert
  • Station Parts Pack
  • Stockalike Station Parts Expansion
  • Tarsier Space Technology with Galaxies
  • Texture Replacer
  • USI Kolonization Systems (MKS/OKS)
  • Universal Storage

Reproduction steps:

Launch game

Logs:

I found this in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP, at the time of the loading stopping, hope this may help.

[LOG 16:56:24.836] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'UmbraSpaceIndustries/Karbonite/Parts/KA_Tank_125_02/KA_Tank_125_02'

[EXC 16:56:24.845] Exception: Attach rules are 7 ints, either ones or zeros, separated by commas!

AttachRules.Parse (System.String value)

System.Reflection.MonoMethod.Invoke (System.Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, System.Object[] parameters, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)

Rethrow as TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation.

System.Reflection.MonoMethod.Invoke (System.Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, System.Object[] parameters, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)

System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke (System.Object obj, System.Object[] parameters)

PartLoader.ParsePart (.UrlConfig urlConfig, .ConfigNode node)

PartLoader+.MoveNext ()

[EXC 16:56:24.850] NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

PartLoader.GetDatabaseConfig (.Part p)

PartLoader.GetDatabaseConfig (.Part p, System.String nodeName)

DragCubeSystem.LoadDragCubes (.Part p)

Part+.MoveNext ()

Edited September 7, 2015 by bigblock111
